title: Mahogany Bay Cruise Port Guide
description: Everything you need to know for your day in Roatán arriving at Mahogany Bay cruise port. Pre-built itineraries, transport options, and insider tips.

content.overview: Mahogany Bay is Carnival Corporation's private cruise port on the south side of Roatán, just a short walk or shuttle ride from the famous West Bay Beach. It's the newer and more tourist-friendly of the two ports, with a small shopping village, chairlift to the beach, and easy access to the island's best attractions.

transportation.description: Carnival's chairlift takes you directly over the water to a private beach area. There's also a shuttle bus. Included with some cruise packages or available for a small fee.
Licensed taxis wait outside the port gates. Negotiate the price before getting in. A ride to West Bay Beach takes about 10 minutes.
Water taxis depart from the dock near the port and take you to West End village in about 15 minutes. A fun way to see the coastline.

itineraries.name: Beach & Bites
steps: Walk or shuttle to West Bay Beach (15 min)
Beach time — rent chairs and snorkel gear (2.5 hours, ~$15)
Lunch at a beachfront restaurant (1 hour, ~$15-25)
Browse West Bay shops for souvenirs (45 min)
Optional: Snorkel at Blue Channel if time allows (45 min)
Return to port via shuttle (15 min — leave 30 min buffer)

itineraries.name: Dive & Explore
steps: Taxi to West End dive shop (15 min, pre-booked 2-tank dive)
Two-tank dive on the Mesoamerican Reef (3 hours, ~$75-85)
Lunch in West End village (1 hour, ~$10-15)
Walk the West End strip, browse shops (45 min)
Taxi back to Mahogany Bay (15 min — leave 45 min buffer)

tips: Get off the ship as early as possible — the beach gets crowded by 10am on double-ship days.
Bring cash in small US bills. Most places accept USD but can't always break large bills.
Reef-safe sunscreen is required at West Bay Beach marine park areas.
The chairlift has a weight limit and can close in high winds. Have a backup plan.
Set an alarm on your phone for 1 hour before all-aboard. Taxis back can take longer than expected.
